extendedInfo.description: If you are Ace Of Base's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Ace Of Base's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Ace Of Base's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Ace Of Base's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- The Sign- The Bridge- Cruel Summer- Da Capo- The Golden Ratio************************List of lyrics ************************- Adventures In Paradise- All For You- All That She Wants- Always Have, Always Will- Angel Eyes- Beautiful Life- Beautiful Morning- Black Sea- Blah, Blah, Blah On The Radio- Blooming 18- Cecilia- Change With The Light- Cruel Summer- Da Capo- Dancer In A Daydream- Donnie- Don't Go Away- Don't Turn Around- Doreen- Edge Of Heaven- Everytime It Rains- Experience Pearls- Happy Nation- He Decides- Hey Darling- Juliet- Just 'N' Image- Living In Danger- Lucky Love- Mr. Replay- My Deja Vu- My Mind (Mindless Mix)- Never Gonna Say I'm Sorry- One Day- Ordinary Day- Perfect World- Precious- Que Sera- Ravine- Remember The Words- Show Me Love- Southern California- Strange Ways- The Golden Ratio- The Juvenile- The Sign- Tokyo Girl- Told My Ma- Travel To Romantis- Unspeakable- Vision In Blue- Voulez-vous Danser- Waiting For Magic- Wave Wet Sand- What's The Name Of The Game- Wheel Of Fortune- Whenever You're Near Me- Whispers In Blindness- Who Am I- Wonderful Life- World Down Under- Young And Proud
